attributes.review:
I downloaded this app just out our curiosity but now I see it was a waste of time to download it. This man has nothing to offer as he has done more damage to our country then good. 

He and his administration is full of criminals that have sexual assaulted children, harmed the LGBT+ community and have racially discriminated against many innocent people. He shouldn’t even have an app let alone run for President again because he is a joke. His whole campaign is a twisted horrible joke that our country doesn’t need.
attributes.title: Horrible App Horrible Leader

attributes.review: First of all when I downloaded this app TOOK 3 HOURS TO DOWNLOAD, this is not acceptable!!! But then I remembered who created this app then I understood why it was so garbage✨😌then when it finally finished downloading, I went to the news section and it did not say how much Trump stank.💅🏼✨🧚🏼‍♂️ The app did not provide information! like how Trump is a racist, white supremacist that looks like an orange bean bag, that is perverted and how he a power hungry, waste of skin and bones.😘✨💫🧚🏼 So I report this app for not having all the information ✨🧚🏼‍♂️😌✨💅🏼💫✨😘😘💁🏻‍♀️
attributes.title: Terrible app it’s is really bad DO NOT GET!!!

attributes.review: this app has got to be the worst app ever made. the company is also horrible people. the app kept glitching too, and for some reason all i could see was a fat orange blob with 47 chins and some corn silk for... i think it was supposed to be hair? it was a very unpleasant experience, most certainly would NOT recommend. also, the political views the app and the company is trying to promote is an absolute DISGRACE to the world. please, never get this app it is absolute garbage, a waste of time, and please do not waste your vote on the soab for the 2020 election as well.
attributes.title: absolutely not🌟

attributes.review: This app is horrible it took 3 months to download no joke! I tried to talk to other people and all of them said they hated it. I would never recommend this app. I was trying to watch keeping up with Obama when I downloaded this app but it just didn’t work I am so disappointed. This app also took up all my battery. And I bought 2 tickets for trumps presentation but I need to watch more keeping up with Obama. I also need to fold the dishes on that day so I won’t be able to go 🙃 and Gen z is gunna take over. (Hi TikTok)
attributes.title: TikTok 4 life

attributes.review: so i was living my life casually 👕 when this fat tangerine decided it would be a good idea 💡 to run for president?? now we have a 5 year old 👦🏼 man-child as a president? so i download this app, cluck on it, and immedietly 💀 my eyes start burning and hurting so bad!! ☹️ all of a sudden they explode!! 💥 this app made my eyeballs pop 👀 the nasty eyeball juice got all over my phone!! now i have to get a new one 😣☹️☹️☹️☹️📱 anyways, theres this super cute Adidas Originals Womens 3-stripe T-shirt in Pastel Yellow that i wanna get, i think its cute but wanna know whats not cute? voting for a rapist pedo for president 🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰
attributes.title: uh oh stinkyyy

attributes.review: This app took three days to download even though I have perfectly good WiFi where I live. The app then asked for my information, and I happily put in my name, address, phone number, and email. I didn’t understand why a dating app would ask for these, but I later found out all my information was sold and I’m scared for my life. This app glitches so much. The only things I’m seeing are ugly oranges, cheetopuffs, racists, homophobic people, bigots, and nazis. This dating app only shows the ugliest people and I’m angry, scared, and lonely now.
attributes.title: UGLY😡😡😡

attributes.review: This app is so horrible I can’t believe it it was supposed to vote not give reasons why this baby man is the worst thing to happen to American history.  Seriously how in the hell do you ruin the country you claimed to, “make great again”. Then to say if you don’t like it leave well sir your ancestors weren’t from here so since you hate it enough to try to”fix” it then you can go home too. The fact that this country is basically nazi Germany and no one cares is astonishing. You wanna make it great then leave.
attributes.userName: keep it real not a fantic
attributes.title: Complaint

attributes.review: This app is horrible I downloaded the app the a ad popped and it was a po*n sight not only that when I pressed the icon it told me to kill myself 😔 I tried to give it one more try the it told me to give it 5 stars or they will kill me the app also showed me a video to explain why apple is “bad” 😔 I am very disappointed in the person who lives in the White House because not only is he racist he is a rapist and he orange like come on pick a struggle😒 ANYWAYS I rate this -10/10 take this app down many people will get hurt 😢
attributes.userName: I am not Barack Obama btw😗
attributes.title: Don’t vote for trump

attributes.review: For some reason this made my phone really glitchy like i went on it and then it wouldn’t let me click on anything or click out of it so i had to restart my phone THEN my phone got stuck in a reboot loop and i spent 5 hours on a laptop trying to fix it. 0/10 do NOT recommend, very disappointed i expected more from my humble smart brilliant president 😔 um and then when i finally got it to turn back on the app was gone like it’s some demonic force or something. Was not able to sleep.
attributes.title: No

attributes.review: I got this app so I could keep up with the news, but not only did this make my phone glitch constantly, I believe my number was sold to telemarketers after entering it on this app. I have realized that this app is only showing what Trump wants us to see and because of that I will be leaving this app, and any faith I had in Trump is now gone. He hasn't accomplished anything that he said he would, instead he has ignored a global pandemic, spread false medical info, and target people of the lgbtq+ and BIPOC communities.
attributes.title: Fake news, telemarketers
